document.full_text: female rapper nicki minaj will join britney spears on her north american tour this summer, promoters said on tuesday, ending weeks of speculation about the line-up.
document.title: rapper nicki minaj to join britney spears on tour
lines_and_colors: female rapper nicki minaj will join britney spears on her north american tour this summer, promoters said on tuesday, ending weeks of speculation about the line-up.
